data.question: Which ministry issued Draft Central Motor Vehicles (...Amendment) Rules ?
choices: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
data.answer: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways

data.question: The Draft Central Motor Vehicles Act was issued in 2019. True or False?
Draft Central Motor Vehicles Rules, 2021 was issued to amend which rule?
Is a trade certificate compulsory if a manufacturer or a dealer has a vehicle?
The authority should verify the application and will provide a trade certificate within how many days?
It is not the responsibility of the authority to provide a written reply incase the application is rejected?
In case of any change in the address of the business owner, the authority should be informed immediately about it?
___ trade registration marks can be obtained online after 7 days of applying.
The authority in no case, cancel the trade certificate. True/False?
